title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
author: Stephen Covey,
bookQuote: Sow a thought, reap an action; sow an action, reap a habit; sow a habit, reap a character; sow a character, reap a destiny.

title: Think and Grow Rich
author: Napoleon Hill
bookQuote: A quitter never wins - and - a winner never quits.

title: The Power of Positive Thinking
author: Norman Vincent Peale
bookQuote: The secret of a better and more successful life is to cast out those old, dead, unhealthy thoughts
